author: Bhragu Haritas, ET CIO
title: Hackers begin exploiting COVID-19 situation at enterprises
description: . As enterprises open up their networks to allow people to work from home, hackers are leaving no stone unturned to exploit every single vulnerability caused in this mayhem. ETCIO; March 27, 2020, 08:24 IST The outbreak of COVID-19 has forced companies--big a…
content: The outbreak of COVID-19 has forced companies--big and small--to allow employees to work from home. As companies grapple with the challenge of ensuring business as usual, hackers are using social engineering tactics to exploit the most out of the end-users am… [+3762 chars]
